danthure satanin pasuwa wuwada wimaladharmasuriya rajuta pruthugisinge aakramanayanhi kelawarak dakiya haki nowiya.thamage rajyaya shakthimath kirimata hithu hethema dakunu indiyawe madurasi wani pradeshiya rajyayawala nayakayangen pihita laba wadiga hamudawak genwagaththeya.idiriyedi pruthugisin ha siduwiya haki satan gana kalpana kala hethema aayudha thana ganime aramunin mathara,kothmale ha walpane yana sthanawala loha karmanthaya naga situwimata piyawara gaththeya.esema aarthika shakthiya wardhanaya kara ganima sandahama puran kumbauru aswadda krushikarmanthaya diyunu kala pamanak nowa kapu wani wagawanda wyaptha karawuyeya.
